headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Scan dependencies for vulnerabilities
digest_items.why: Vulnerable dependencies are a common attack vector in supply chain attacks
digest_items.fix: Use tools like npm audit, pip-audit, or Snyk in your CI/CD pipeline

digest_items.title: Implement security awareness training
digest_items.why: Human error is the leading cause of security incidents
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly phishing simulations and security training

digest_items.title: Implement password complexity requirements
digest_items.why: Weak passwords are easily cracked by brute force attacks
digest_items.fix: Require minimum 12 characters with mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols

digest_items.title: Implement session timeout
digest_items.why: Long-lived sessions increase risk of session hijacking
digest_items.fix: Set session timeout to 15-30 minutes for sensitive applications

digest_items.title: Remove default credentials
digest_items.why: Default passwords are publicly known and exploited by automated scanners
digest_items.fix: Change all default passwords immediately after deployment

digest_items.title: Implement input validation
digest_items.why: Unvalidated input leads to injection attacks and data corruption
digest_items.fix: Validate all user input on both client and server side
